channel.title: UK on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in UK on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Key trends in mobile usage from the UK
item.description: Mobile usage in the UK is on the increase. That's all sounding good so far.

item.title: Mobile Usage and Trends - Updated with UK Statistics
item.description: Good mobile insights and statistics are hard to find unless you pay for them … that's why I've just updated my Key Trends and Usage Insights to include data for the UK.

item.title: Today I'm a flag-waving, card-carrying Pom!
item.description: Just in time for Christmas - after 6 years of being harangued at Passport Control, questioned a million times and having to cough up around a £1000 a year for the past 3 years, I can now say I'm a whinging Pom.

item.title: Social Networks & Social Gaming used most for Mobile Broadband
item.description: This news from Hutchison 3G UK shows that using social media is more important on their mobile network is interesting -.

item.title: Social Media Marketing Jobs - Recruiters & HR Professionals
item.description: Are you looking for work? Need to know what Recruiters and Agencies in London, UK are looking after Social Media Marketing?

item.title: NEWS: Price Grabber research says we spend more on the mobile
item.description: Finally some proof that Mobile Internet usage is profoundly shaking up the way consumers shop, according to new research from PriceGrabber.

item.title: Foursquare most popular location checkin game in London
item.description: Foursquare is still the UK's most popular location based check-in game to play on your mobile.

item.title: What kids do online: UK Internet Usage
item.description: Recent indepth report from New Media Age in the UK focused on the internet usage habits of kids.

item.title: Does building an iPhone App make cents? sense?
item.description: With the boom in the number of apps in the App Store (over 100,000) and total downloads in excess of 2bn - someone has got to be making money - right?

item.title: 3 rewards customers who get customers
item.description: From today 3 UK will reward customers with cashback for referrals.

item.title: New UK MVNO before Christmas - Giffgaff to offer free calls
item.description: Name: Giffgaff MNO: O2 A SIM-only MVNO offering cheaper calls to its most active subscribers is to launch in the UK before Christmas.

item.title: We are watching you and reading your texts and emails
item.description: The UK for along time has been a country full of honours and award systems — the most CCTV cameras comes to mind and from today it seems that the UK Government believes that for your safety, they will need to record details and the contents of every SMS, email, voicemails and phone calls.

item.title: Datz makes downloading unlimited DRM free music hard
item.description: Comment: Datz music lounge has come out for Xmas in the UK with a £99.
